content: of the hundreds of holes that this thick yet airy poncho features only two are large enough to stick more than your fingers through hundreds of interconnected four-petal flowers work up in one easy stitch in one piece from start to finish this little piece features a draw-string neck-line and adjustable length and you can plan ahead when measuring your size to allow it to double as a skirt adding versatility to at least one item taking up your closet space
